title: Звичайна людина
overview: Oleg always considered himself an ordinary person, without ambitions for heroism or fame. But when the war knocks on the door, his life turns upside down. Finding his daughter becomes his main goal. Having gone to the occupied territory, Oleg is faced with the lawlessness and cruelty of the invaders who commit atrocities. During the entire journey, the main character has to do the impossible: to save not only himself, but also the people around him.
